item.title: Advance Testing in Go
item.description: Test Methodology Subtest Closures Can target subtests Can nest subtests further Table Driven Test Low overhead to add new test cases Make testing exhaustive scenarios simple Makes reproducing reported issues simple Do this pattern a lot Followw pattern even for single cases, if it’s possible to grow Consider naming cases Text fixtures. go test sets pwd as package directory Use relative path “test-fixtures” directory as a place to store test data Very useful for loading config, model data, binary data, etc Golden Files(Test Flags) Compare complex test out to a file that has the expected result.
